verses.verse: And in that day <WH3117> seven <WH7651> women <WH802> shall take <WH2388> hold <WH2388> of one <WH259> man, <WH376> saying, <WH559> We will eat <WH398> our own bread, <WH3899> and wear <WH3847> our own apparel: <WH8071> only <WH7535> let us be called <WH7121> by your name, <WH8034> to take <WH622> away our reproach. <WH2781>

In that day <WH3117> shall the branch <WH6780> of the LORD <WH3068> be beautiful <WH6643> and glorious, <WH3519> and the fruit <WH6529> of the earth <WH776> shall be excellent <WH1347> and comely <WH8597> for them that are escaped <WH6413> of Israel. <WH3478>

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that he that is left <WH7604> in Zion, <WH6726> and he that remains <WH3498> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> shall be called <WH559> holy, <WH6918> even every <WH3605> one that is written <WH3789> among the living <WH2416> in Jerusalem: <WH3389>

When <WH518> the Lord <WH136> shall have washed <WH7364> away the filth <WH6675> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> and shall have purged <WH1740> the blood <WH1818> of Jerusalem <WH3389> from the middle <WH7130> thereof by the spirit <WH7307> of judgment, <WH4941> and by the spirit <WH7307> of burning. <WH1197>

And the LORD <WH3068> will create <WH1254> on every <WH3605> dwelling <WH4349> place of mount <WH2022> Zion, <WH6726> and on her assemblies, <WH4744> a cloud <WH6051> and smoke <WH6227> by day, <WH3119> and the shining <WH5051> of a flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> by night: <WH3915> for on all <WH3605> the glory <WH3519> shall be a defense. <WH2646>

And there shall be a tabernacle <WH5521> for a shadow <WH6738> in the day time <WH3119> from the heat, <WH2721> and for a place of refuge, <WH4268> and for a covert <WH5643> from storm <WH2230> and from rain. <WH4306>
